headline: Ross Stores (ROST) Is Up 8.4% After Raising 2025 Guidance on Strong Q3 Results
summary: Ross Stores recently reported third-quarter results with sales of US$5.60 billion and net income of US$511.94 million, exceeding analyst expectations and prompting the company to raise its earnings and comparable store sales guidance for both the fourth quarter and full year 2025. The company highlighted continued strong demand for value retail and noted that tariff-related costs are expected to have a minimal impact on fourth-quarter results due to effective vendor negotiations. Following...
